00036 /* different alignment commands for gcc / MSVS, the structure needs to be 1-byte aligned.
00037 */
00038 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00039         #pragma pack(push, 1)

00045 struct MessageHeader {
00046         uint8_t m_preamble;
00047         uint8_t m_busId;
00048         uint8_t m_messageId;
00049         uint8_t m_length;
00050         union _mdl {
00051                 struct _mextd {
00052                         struct _mlen {
00053                                 uint8_t m_high;
00054                                 uint8_t m_low;
00055                         } m_length;
00056                         uint8_t m_data[CMT_MAXDATALEN];
00057                 } m_extended;
00058                 uint8_t m_data[254];
00059         } m_datlen;
00060 }
00061 // different alignment commands for gcc / MSVS
00062 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00063         ;
00064         #pragma pack(pop)
00065 #else
00066         __attribute__((__packed__))     ;
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 #if defined(_DEBUG) && defined(_CMT_CHECK_MSG_DATA_INTEGRITY)
00070         #define CMT_CHECKVAR    uint32_t m_checkvar;
00071         #define CMT_CHECKVAL    10101010
00072         #define CMT_CHECKASSIGN m_checkvar = CMT_CHECKVAL;
00073         #define CMT_CHECKASSERT if (m_checkvar != CMT_CHECKVAL) throw "Message assertion failed!";
00074 #else
00075         #define CMT_CHECKVAR
00076         #define CMT_CHECKVAL
00077         #define CMT_CHECKASSIGN
00078         #define CMT_CHECKASSERT
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 #define swapEndian16(src) (((src) >> 8) | ((src) << 8))
00082 #define swapEndian32(src) (((src) >> 24) | ((src) >> 8 & 0xFF00) | ((src) << 8 & 0xFF0000) | ((src) << 24))
